creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and the Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation; purchase from the Thomas Murray Collection
description: five vertical panels stitched together to form an single panel; brown cloth with images rendered in black pigment; inscriptions in Japanese characters in URC; trees in ULC; seated figures in LRQ and LLQ

title: Bast fiber wall hanging
